column1: Funeral Services for Lisa and Hailey will take place at Mechanic Grove Church of the Brethren
column5: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. Interment will be in the adjoining church cemetery. The family will receive friends at the church on Friday from 2-4 and 6-8 p.m. Instead of flowers
